articles.title: Ricky Ponting backs out-of-form Suryakumar Yadav, says he can win World Cup for India - Indiatimes.com
articles.description: Cricket News: Australia legend Ricky Ponting has come out in full support of out-of-form star India batter Suryakumar Yadav and feels that India should stick with h
articles.content: Suryakumar Yadav has got to stick to what has worked for him: AB de VilliersSouth African batting great AB de Villiers has a simple advice for Suryakumar Yadav, the World No 1 T20I batsman whos going… [+168 chars]
